workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.13390241337042103 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.048308177153526366 --weight-decay 0.00042274811156985847 --lr 0.0006420007113748904 --lr-scheduler cosine --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --warmup-updates 108051 --max-lr 0.0006819334603831457 --min-lr 1e-09 --t-mult 0.23469675363977827 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.1886247779205483 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY
